subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
Football
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: On Day 1 of free agency in the N.F.L., Peyton Manning remained available as the music was only beginning in the league’s annual game of musical chairs.
